passive.name: A THOUSAND CUTS
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) A THOUSAND CUTS
                                Attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (1% + 0.005% ) of the target's maximum health. Heals for 70% of the damage this ability deals to champion, up to 12 (12 + 7% ).Deals a max of 2 magic damage (2 + 3% ) against monsters.

q.name: (Q) SNIP SNIP!
q.description:
(Q) SNIP SNIP!
 6.5/5.5/4.5/3.5s   35 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Gains 1 stack per attack hit (max 4, lasts 6 seconds).Active: Snips her scissors twice, snipping an extra time for each stack consumed. Each snip deals 14 magic damage (14/18/22/26 + 6% ) with the final snip dealing 70 magic damage (70/90/110/130 + 30% ) instead.The center of each strike deals true damage instead an applies Thousand Cuts.Deals 80% damage to monsters.

w.name: (W) HALLOWED MIST
w.description:
(W) HALLOWED MIST
 17/16/15/14s   60 
                                
                                
                                Summons the Hallowed Mist, making Gwen unforgettable to enemies outside the zone while inside.Gwen gains 18 (18/20/22/24 + 5% ) Amor and Magic Resist inside the Mist.The Mist will move to Gwen the first time she attempts to leave.

e.name: (E) SKIP'N SLASH
e.description:
(E) SKIP'N SLASH
 13.5/12/10.5/9s   35 
                                
                                
                                Dashes and enhances her attacks for 4 seconds. Enhance attacks gain 20/40/60/80% Attack Speed, 10 magic damage (10 + 15% ) on-hit and 100 Range.The first enhanced attack to hit a champion or minion refunds 50% of this ability's cooldown.

r.name: (R) NEEDLEWORK
r.description:
(R) NEEDLEWORK
 75/65/55s   100 
                                
                                
                                First Cast: Hurl a needle that deals 30 magic damage (30/45/60 + 8% ), slows by 35/40/45% for 1.5 seconds, and applies Thousand Cuts to all enemies hit. Needlework can be re-cast 2 additional times.Second Cast: Fires 3 needles, dealing a total of 90 magic damage (90 + 24% ).Third Cast: Fires 5 needles, dealing a total of 150 magic damage (150 + 40% ).

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
example_build_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

runes_detailed.name: Coup de Grace
runes_detailed.description: Rune effect for Coup de Grace
After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal over time based on missing health.
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
